room_title: Escape room "House of Fear VR" by VR Tech Lounge in Boise
review: I strongly reccomend VR Tech Loung. Me and my husband stopped by for a date night. We had such an amazing time. We got a date night package that included a dinner. Everything about our experience was perfect. The staff was great and amazing. We will defiantly be stopping by more often.

room_title: Escape room "House of Fear VR" by VR Tech Lounge in Boise
review: I have had two experience with VR Tech Lounge and they both have been great. This is so much fun for a date night or just wanting to try something different. Sasa and his team and very knowledgeable and do a great job making sure you are comfortable and having fun!

room_title: Escape room "House of Fear VR" by VR Tech Lounge in Boise
review: loved everything about it! Really fun place! Staff was amazing!
